message:
Dear all,Assalamu Alaikum.

Those who have taken sweets on Shahadat of Abdul Qadir Mollah in GonoJagoran Mancha( about a thousand persons ) are barbaric and inhuman people.

As against about a thousand person of Gana Jagoron Mancha who are dancing on the death of Abdul Qadir Mollah,large gaherings in 100 places attended Gaibana Janaja of Abdul Qadir Mollah
~Shah Abdul Hannan
